settings.title: What is Nomad Internet?
settings.content:
Nomad Internet is America's largest Wireless Internet Service
Provider. We are focused on providing High-Speed wireless Internet to
rural communities all over the country and on-the-road travelers!

settings.title: How does Nomad Internet work?
settings.content:
Instead of using traditional Internet wires, we do it by
transmitting wireless Internet access directly to your home, business,
and even while traveling! We combine the latest technology with
Verizon’s service to provide high-speed internet to rural locations and
traveling nomads. We offer a variety
of internet plans, allowing you to choose one that fits your needs.

settings.title: Do I need to sign a contract to use Nomad Internet?
settings.content: No contract with Nomad Internet. You get to choose the subscription plan that’s best for you.

settings.title: Is Nomad Internet secure?
settings.content:
Yes, all Nomad Internet modems let you use public IPs.
Multiple layers of encryption, enhanced Wi-Fi security, firewall
filtering, built-in VPN support, IT admin controls, and other features
deliver strong security at every level.

settings.title: Can I use Nomad Internet for gaming?
settings.content:
Yes. Even if you are in the most remote location, we will
provide you with robust and reliable internet for all your gaming needs.
No matter your plan, you can expect fast internet with low ping rates
and latency.

settings.title: Can I use Nomad Internet for RVing?
settings.content:
Nomad Internet users can take the same high-speed,
low-latency service they have at home to any location Nomad Internet has
coverage. Nomad Internet for RVers/travelers will allow users to pause
and un-pause service based on their individual travel needs.

settings.title: Answers to the most frequently asked questions

settings.name: Vincent Armstrong
settings.text: I recently signed up with Nomad Internet, a rural Wi-Fi network provider, and it has been an incredibly positive experience so far! The set-up process was straightforward and the Nomad Air modem arrived quickly. I'm now receiving high speed internet with reliable connection in my home - something that can be difficult to find when living in rural areas. I'm extremely happy with my choice of internet provider and highly recommend Nomad Internet to anyone looking for an affordable and dependable service.

settings.name: Gloria Boyd
settings.text: Now I have great high-speed Internet for work and communication. Nomad Internet has made me happy!

settings.name: Robert Monroe
settings.text: I recently subscribed to Nomad internet and I'm absolutely loving it. As a rural internet user, being able to rely on a reliable connection with a secure connection is paramount. My speeds are generally always quite high (higher than my provider promised) and I never have any issue when it comes to streaming or downloading things. All in all, this wi-fi internet provider is well worth the investment - highly recommended!

settings.name: Erin Park
settings.text: As someone who lives in rural area I know the importance of having a reliable broadband wireless internet connection due to my remote location. That's why chose Nomad Internet as my broadband wireless internet provider and they didn't disappont. Their broadband wireless internet service has provided me and my family with a secure and reliable connection, even in our remote location. I highly recommend their services to anyone who value a stable connection!
